title: Changeling

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, learn half (rounded up) of the town roles in the game at random. You may choose two to gain the abilities and attributes of.
- Swap roles with a player at night, with the exception of faction and goal staying the same. This happens after all other actions resolve that night. You cannot use this on the same night as another ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you are alive and Metamorph-aligned in a Metamorph victory, that victory is nullified and the Good faction wins instead.

desc:
Post 2267
*Nothing’s wrong. It’s all as usual—you can trust me.*
